definition: "leftover woman" (successful career woman who has remained single)
to remain/to be left/to have as remainder

sentences.english: All the old lady did was quote a scripture to you.
sentences.chinese: 這位剩女所做的就是念了一段經。

sentences.english: Why would I marry a woman who has been 'left behind’?
sentences.chinese: 李先生說，”我爲什麼要跟一個剩女結婚呢？

sentences.english: The second chapter mainly explored the history of the formation of "3S Lady" group.
sentences.chinese: 第三章“剩女”羣體產生的城鄉互動解釋。

sentences.english: M: Although you are a 3s lady, you should be more careful with your emotion.
sentences.chinese: 雖然是剩女，你也要慎重對待感情。

sentences.english: Usual 28, not married, are also considered a female left.
sentences.chinese: 往常28了還沒結婚，也算剩女了。

sentences.english: Show have become an older woman, waiting for the light in the west.
sentences.chinese: 秀秀已經熬成了一個大齡剩女，苦苦等待着西光。

definition: older (than average in a group, at school, for marriage etc)
young people in their late 20s or older who are still unmarried
fig. unmarried person/single person (especially one who is comfortable financially)
Pentium III microprocessor, abbr. for 奔騰三|奔腾三
to seek a marriage partner/looking for a mate
to marry for the second time/second marriage/second spouse
blind date/arranged interview to evaluate a proposed marriage partner (Taiwan pr. [xiang4 qin1])/to be deeply attached to each other
